title: The Bible's Story: Saga of the Savior King
description: If you're looking for a Bible storybook you and your children will love, you have picked up the right book! The Bible's Story not only includes many familiar Bible stories, but also a simple and clear explanation of THE story woven throughout the whole Bible. The Old and New Testaments come together in a way that makes sense to readers of all ages, and God's unconditional love is seen on every page. Written with modern-day language, creativity, and humor, The Bible's Story brings God's Word to life and draws the reader into its pages. As you share this book with your children, they will listen, learn, and beg for more.
author: Melanie Kirk
